LanguageData.CommandFireGlobalDesc: Select a target on the world map to strike from a distance.
LanguageData.CommandFireLocalDesc: Manually order the turret to attack a target on the local map.
LanguageData.MessageTargetMustBeMap: The target of the ranged strike must be an explored location.
LanguageData.CommandClearAllTargetsDesc: Cancels all currently set local and remote targets.
